DC CODE ยง 1-307.66

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An individual whose household income does not exceed 85% of the District of Columbia median income may open an opportunity account.
The total balance in an opportunity account, except interested earned on matching funds or funds deposited into the account by the account holder, shall not exceed $10,000.

heading.catch_text: Eligibility to open an opportunity account; account limit.
